label: AB3C_hP20_190_ac_i_f-001
title: CsSO$_{3}$ ($K1_{2}$) Structure
comments:
(H\"{a}gg, 1932) states that the space group might be $P6_{3}22$ \#182 or P(-6)c2 \#188.  We follow (Downs, 2003) and use the later. 
 (H\"{a}gg, 1932) and (Downs, 2003) set the sulfur coordinate $z_{3} = 0.73$.  As noted by (Hermann, 1937), this gives a very short S-S bond distance, on the order of 0.5{\AA}.  We use the value suggested by (Hermann, 1937), $z_{3} = 0.66$, ``which gives the S$_{2}$O$_{6}$ group exactly the same shape it has in \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C_hP30_150_ef_3g_c2d-001}{K$_{2}$S$_{2}$O$_{6}$ [{\em Strukturbericht} $K1_{1}$].''}
